Lloyd H. MAUPIN v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 5751. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Jan. 7, 1958. Donald E. Kelley, U. S. Atty., and John S. Pfeiffer, Asst. U. S. Atty., Denver, Colo., for appellee.

Before BRATTON, Chief Judge, PICKETT, Circuit Judge, and RICE, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without written opinion.
